title: Did racist parents allow their child to die?
subtitle: There is a series of tweets sent by the Twitter account (@FierceFemtivist) that have since been removed, claiming that the parents of a white child who left the child die nonetheless instead of receiving care from a black nurse.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A child died in an unnamed medical facility because his parents refused to allow a black nurse to take care of the child.
